tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE art_gallery_inventory (
  artwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artwork_name VARCHAR(255),
  artist_name VARCHAR(255),
  year_created INT,
  medium VARCHAR(100),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE art_gallery_inventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_name VARCHAR,
    artist_name VARCHAR,
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE sales_data (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_id INT,
    sales_date DATE,
    customer_name VARCHAR,
    sale_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE art_inventory (
  inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artwork_id INT NOT NULL,
  gallery_id INT NOT NULL,
  artist VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE art_galleries (
    gallery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gallery_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE artists (
    artist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    nationality VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE art_pieces (
    piece_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    piece_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist_id INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    sold BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    piece_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    sale_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE art_gallery (
  gallery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gallery_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE artist (
  artist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artist_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  nationality VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE artwork (
  artwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artwork_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  artist_id INT,
  price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  creation_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE sale (
  sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artwork_id INT,
  sale_date DATE NOT NULL,
  sale_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE exhibition (
  exhibition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gallery_id INT,
  exhibition_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL
)
